name: wannian
description: 万年 - 命理推演系统

scripts.setup:frontend: npm install --registry=https://registry.npmmirror.com && cd frontend && npm install --registry=https://registry.npmmirror.com
scripts.setup:backend: cd backend && python -m venv .venv && .\.venv\Scripts\pip install -r requirements.txt -i https://mirrors.aliyun.com/pypi/simple/
scripts.setup: npm run setup:frontend && npm run setup:backend
